desc: Remove an emoji across an Enterprise organization

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

name.desc: The name of the emoji to be removed. Colons (`:myemoji:`) around the value are not required, although they may be included.

failed_to_remove_emoji.desc: Failed to remove the specified emoji.

failure_removing_emoji.desc: This emoji could not be removed. It might be part of the standard Unicode set or the default Slack package.

feature_not_enabled.desc: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.

not_an_admin.desc: This method is only accessible by org owners and Admins.
